name: The Basilisk (itch) (Deimo)
description:
"I walk into the room, the fluorescent lighting making it look like a normal day."

"Except it isn't."

"I know, from their expressions, something has gone very wrong."

"What's it doing?"

"It's online."

"Did you try disabling the wifi?"

"Yes, but it hacked into the satellite system."

"I see."

"Unplug it."

"Sir, are you su-"

"Unplug it!"

"This wasn't a simple task. The system was across many different rooms, with many different components. Just how much power had to be cut off to kill it?"

"Shut the power down, too."

"The room soon went dark."

"The only light was from the sun edging through the slits of the closed blinds."

"And... from the servers in the room. The lights continuing to blink."

Follow the journey of a Precog - a person able to see fragments of the future, as he tries to prevent catastrophic futures from happening.
